_source.text: 2. Bruce Springsteen at the Bradley Center in Milwaukee, Aug. 7: Even better than his performance at the Rosemont Theatre last May, this concert found the solo Springsteen looser and more adventurous than he has been on stage since the '70s.

text: 2. **Bruce** Springsteen at the Bradley Center in Milwaukee, Aug. 7: Even **better** **than** his performance
at the **Rosemont** Theatre last May, this concert found the solo Springsteen looser and more adventurous than he has been on stage since the '70s.
